item.title: JSNetworkX test
item.description:
<script type='text/javascript'>
    $(function() {
        var G = jsnx.binomial_graph(6, 0.3);
        G.node[0].label = 'lol';
         
        jsnx.draw(G, {
            element: '#canvas',
            with_labels: true ,
            edge_style: {
                'stroke-width': 10
            },
            node_style: {
                stroke: 'none'
            }
        }, true);
    });
</script><div id='canvas' />
